name: Minccino
description: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.

attacks.name: Glance
attacks.effect: Look at the top card of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Tail Slap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
